headline: ‘Get Ready for AI’s Next Major Wave’: Piper Sandler Says These 2 AI Stocks Are Top Picks for 2025
summary: Artificial intelligence took the tech world by storm at the end of 2022, with the introduction of ChatGPT and generative AI. The past few years have seen a tech boom, as AI proliferated through the digital world and an increasingly large array of other sectors. Now we’re on the cusp of AI’s next wave, and the question is: how big will it get? According to market.us, in 2023, the global market for AI apps was worth $2.8 billion, but could that reach $128 billion by 2033. In a recent industry note

headline: Reflecting On Design Software Stocks’ Q4 Earnings: PTC (NASDAQ:PTC)
summary: Looking back on design software stocks’ Q4 earnings, we examine this quarter’s best and worst performers, including PTC (NASDAQ:PTC) and its peers.
